participant_1.background: my favorite shirts are band shirts and ruffle sleeves. i'm a blonde girl with really short hair. i'm rather skinny as i like to stay in shape. my favorite hobbies are listening to music and playing video games.

participant_2.background: i remember when nobody had a television. i love to drink wine and dance in the moonlight. i am very strong for my age. i'm 100 years old. i feel like i might live forever.
